## trix() function

[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trix\_(technical\_analysis)](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Trix_(technical_analysis))

Note: the number of results will be `3 * (period - 1) + 1` less than the number of processed inputs.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare function trix(period: number): Transducer<number, number>;
```
